cleaned_text: Enhancing Rituals and Spells The long and rich history of herbalism and its expanding current popularity make it a fascinating and rewarding field to explore. One of the major texts on herbs, natural diet, lifestyle, and holistic health. Now in its expanded, updated revised edition, this is the original classic text (with more than five million copies sold) that helped create the natural foods industry. First published in 1939, Kloss' encyclopedic home treasury of herbal medicine, natural foods, and home remedies is as relevant now as it was then.
